task_data.title: CRITICAL: Dashboard KPI metrics not reporting to all panels. Investigate dashboard/public/index.html KPI display logic, dashboard server API endpoints for metrics, coordination file parsing (worker-pool.json, task-queue.json, pm-state.json), WebSocket data streaming, and metric calculation functions. Fix all broken KPI displays and ensure real-time updates work correctly.
